she

comlink

> >

com 
> > link
> > 
> > "Maxima needs you, sir... My skills are't enough to cure her 
wounds" 
> > said Blackstorm.
> > 
> > "I see"replied Perceptor "Care her until I arrive, I don't 
delay "

here 
> > soon"
> > 
> > Outside Perceptor looked to Sharpclaws and Battera and said "I 
have 
> > to go, Sharpclaws, why don't you try to contact Flicker, and ask

have 
> > other patient to attend"
> > 
> > Perceptor stood up and walked towards the Base
> 
> She grinned weakly but wickedly. "I haven't functioned for 9 
millenia just to 
> cease to function now as some weak techno-organic." Her optics had 
that fire 
> in them of witnessing thousands of battles, demises, destructions, 
emotions, 
> conquests & more. She may be an old bot to some, but she still had 
the fire & 
> vigor to function.. & to fight. 
> 
> Leaning against the CR, she watched Blackstorm. "I suppose... 
there is not 
> a.. system or.. computer here.. that.. cannot handle... an upload 
from ... my 
> meta-processor?"
